name: Mind Dead
description:
Play as Max Cooper, an SSF agent whose journey to a deserted oil producing community with a group of scientists has led to an outbreak of infection back at their research facility.
Fight hard for survival as you battle the hordes of fierce infectees in this action survival game.

Key Game Features
- A third person survival action game.
- Campaign mode (Main story mode)
- Lockdown mode (Choose from two different playable characters)
- Game saves automatically at every checkpoint.
